alert.note: Alert for Ashley (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 6:03AM CST until January 12 at 6:45AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 645 AM CST. * At 603 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fountain Hill to near West Crossett, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Crossett, Hamburg, and North Crossett around 610 AM CST. Snyder and Berlin around 615 AM CST. Portland and Montrose around 625 AM CST. Wilmot and Parkdale around 630 AM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for southeastern Arkansas.
